overview: Gorgeous MILF Aubrey Black is home alone with her hunky adult stepson Byron Rhodes. Sounds innocent enough, right? It is until Aubrey comes down the stairs and spots Byron jerking off to porn on the couch! Turned on by Byron's big cock and brazen horniness, Aubrey sneaks up on him and takes his porn away.  You gotta take the good with the bad in this life. The bad for young Jason is being stuck at home with an inconvenient hand injury, the good is getting some one on one time with his sexy and attentive stepmom Lacy Bender. She makes the only compassionate choice offering to give her stepson a good ball-draining fuck.
title: Day With A Pornstar 10
